TextView.android:text: We face many health related problems in our everyday life but every time it is not possible to consult with a doctor. This problem can be solved if there is someone who can tell us what we should do in that situation . This app works like a doctor who is available whenever an user needs. This will not give any advanced level treatment for a complicated disease as it will not be safe. But this doctor can solve user's small problems and give them a temporary relief in a complicated situation.
